original_title: Rosas blancas para mi hermana negra
overview: The story revolves around Laura, a white singer, and Angustias, her longtime black friend, with both mothers dedicated to the education of their daughters: Alicia and Roberta. Trouble ensues when Laura’s daughter, Alicia, falls in love with Ricardo, a young black medical student.
title: Rosas blancas para mi hermana negra
